channel.title: Silver Fox Blog
channel.description: A place where I share interesting findings, new projects and just random thoughts. Kinda like my Twitter feed, but without a character limit.

item.title: The Lioness Programming Language
item.description: For over the past 9 months, I've been working on perhaps my biggest project yet: a programming language.
